Package org.cojen.tupl.repl

Interface DirectReplicator.Writer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, DirectReplicator.Accessor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MessageReplicator.Writer, StreamReplicator.Writer
    Enclosing interface:
    DirectReplicator
    public static interface DirectReplicator.Writer
extends DirectReplicator.Accessor
    Direct interface for writing to a replicator, for a given term.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void uponCommit​(long index, LongConsumer task)
      Invokes the given task when the commit index reaches the requested index.
      default void uponEndCommit​(LongConsumer task)
      Invokes the given task when the commit index reaches the end of the term.
      long waitForCommit​(long index, long nanosTimeout)
      Blocks until the commit index reaches the given index.
      default long waitForEndCommit​(long nanosTimeout)
      Blocks until the commit index reaches the end of the term.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.cojen.tupl.repl.DirectReplicator.Accessor

        close, commitIndex, index, term, termEndIndex, termStartIndex

    • Method Detail

      • waitForCommit

        long waitForCommit​(long index,
                   long nanosTimeout)
            throws InterruptedIOException
        Blocks until the commit index reaches the given index.
        Parameters:
        nanosTimeout - relative nanosecond time to wait; infinite if <0
        Returns:
        current commit index, or -1 if deactivated before the index could be reached, or -2 if timed out
        Throws:
        InterruptedIOException

      • waitForEndCommit

        default long waitForEndCommit​(long nanosTimeout)
                       throws InterruptedIOException
        Blocks until the commit index reaches the end of the term.
        Parameters:
        nanosTimeout - relative nanosecond time to wait; infinite if <0
        Returns:
        current commit index, or -1 if closed before the index could be reached, or -2 if timed out
        Throws:
        InterruptedIOException

      • uponCommit

        void uponCommit​(long index,
                LongConsumer task)
        Invokes the given task when the commit index reaches the requested index. The current commit index is passed to the task, or -1 if the term ended before the index could be reached. If the task can be run when this method is called, then the current thread invokes it immediately.

      • uponEndCommit

        default void uponEndCommit​(LongConsumer task)
        Invokes the given task when the commit index reaches the end of the term. The current commit index is passed to the task, or -1 if if closed. If the task can be run when this method is called, then the current thread invokes it immediately.
